name: Catalyst Demo
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 30 - Theme: Connected Worlds

Unfortunately we didn't finish the game. Fortunately we will finish it in the One Game A Month game jam! Stay tuned!

Made with C++, SFML, wxWidget.

Team:

  • Niño Mollaneda - Programmer and Animator
  • David Mason - Artist
  • Will G.J. - Game Designer

Credit to the following for sharing:

  • Alexandr Zhelanov - "Dark Hall" music
  • Paolo D'Emilio - "We're Doomed" sfx
  • StumpyStrust - Dark Button
